titles.title: Fossil Creek Wild and Scenic River Act of 2005
A bill to designate segments of Fossil Creek, a tributary to the Verde River in the State of Arizona, as wild and scenic rivers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/28/2006--Introduced. Fossil Creek Wild and Scenic River Act of 2005 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified segments of Fossil Creek, a tributary to the Verde River in Arizona, as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to submit a river management plan for the designated segments.
